transcript:
Customer: Hello
Haa sir bataiye.
Executive: Haan ji mam. Haan sir aap jo bol rahe the na dekhiye main iske ek professionally mail kiya maine. Kyunki jab bhavna ne bhi mere ko hamare package ka jo bhi baat hua tha to bhavna se baat ho gayi thi bhavna ka jo number tha bhavna leke chali gayi. Theek aur hamare paas koi ek official message nahi officially koi message nahi hai jo hum ye bata sake unhone ye kaha tha ki agar aapka benefit nahi hota hai to within three months mein main return karti hu. To ye to call bhi baat hui thi. Bas is yahi reason tha maine mail kiya hai aur bataiye. Achcha achcha achcha. Iske alawa aap kuch kehna chahte hain?
Customer: Nahi mam agar jaise aapke side se agar hum yahi cheez karte to mam main to kya hai na mere ko rakha hi isliye gaya hai taki main aapki problem ko solve kar saku. Hum samajh rahe hain aapki baatein bhi samajh rahe hain bilkul sir aap jo keh rahe hain wo sahi cheez hai lekin but sir hume bhi to kuch chahiye na sir. Bilkul mam to ha samajh rahe hain. Mam aapke paas jitni inquiries wagera aayi hai mam kuch bhi convert nahi hua hai kya?
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Matlab even a single deal even a single deal convert nahi hui kya? Sir aap agar within agar aap November ki baat karte hain to single billing nahi hui hai November ki baat karte hain to. November mein jaise aapne 82 agar buyleads aapne consume kari hai to 82 mein kuch bhi convert nahi hua.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: November mein nahi November mein ek bhi billing nahi hui hai sir October mein main October mein aapne haan. October mein hui hai September mein hui hai November mein nahi hui sir.
Executive: October mein September mein November mein nahi hui hai. Mam mam aap bhi mam maan ke chaliye koi jaise business hai to ye to mam nahi hai na har time mam wo ekdam peak par chalega. Abhi mam sardiyon ke time mein aap bhi thoda samajhte honge ke agar mam ye doctors hote hain na unpe garmiyon ke time mein bheed jyada hoti hai aur sardiyon ke time mein bheed hoti hai kam. Ab sardiyon ke time mein garmiyon mein kya hota hai ke do char bimari wagera jyada failti hai. Ab garmiyon mein sardiyon jab ho jati hai to ye good months mein calculate hote hain. Ab usme aapka jo equipment jo jitni aapka product line hai na wo doctors ki use ki jyada hai. Manti hai mam ye cheez. Sara ka sara mam doctors ke kaam aata hai.
Customer: To sir ek baat bataiye mera to abhi ye working hours nahi hai to main aapse baat karti hu.
Executive: Mam abhi bhi mam aap kar hi rahe hain mam to mam main yahi kahunga ke aap mam thoda matlab wo rakhe abhi aisa nahi hai mam ke business nahi aayega mam aapko
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ji ji ji mam mam yahi kahunga ke abhi mam is month ke liye mam aapse matlab kya bolu mam agar market mein business aayega to mam surely aapke paas aayega. Abhi kya hai na market mein matlab ye jitne aapke doctor equipment hai na wo doctor ke use ke hain. Ab mam jab doctor aapke business leti hu December se dekhti hu aap yahi kehna chah rahe hain na theek hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Mam mera yahi hai baki mam aapki jo ticket hai mam uska mam kya karna hai abhi isko chalne du ya fir close karu?
Customer: Sir ek baar aap mujhe Google Meet kar lijiyega kal dekh lijiyega. Aur account wagera bhi dekh lijiyega fir main uske baad aapko batati hu. Theek hai sir. Abhi mam main jaise aapke kuch products hain is samay mere ko kuch dikh raha hai mam jo seedha mere ko theek nahi lag rahi hain. Line pe rahega main aapke product aapko bata deta hu. Nahi sir meri working hours nahi hai main baat karti hu aapse kal.
Executive: Hum koi issue nahi hai aapke working hours nahi matlab main aapse request hi kar sakta kar sakta hu uske baad hum kya kar sakta hu. Ek request hi thi mam aur abhi main bilkul aapse baat karungi main kal baat karti hu sir.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Mam abhi mam aapne itna time diya hai mam bas ek do minute mam aur de do mere ko. Aapko isko jyada nahi mang raha ek do minute ki aapse baat hai. Jaise ek ye ek category mere ko isme add kar de raha hu jaise jo aapke diaper hai na ye wala Ramson Dignity Magna add productive underwear Ramson. Ye adult diaper isko mam ye khali ek hi category mein map hai adult diaper isko mam agar hum jaise in contingency diaper mein bhi isko add karte hain to iski jo buyleads hain wo aapko badh jayengi. Theek hai. Aur jaise disposable diaper ek category hoti hai mam ek product ko na aap do category mein map karo. Samajh rahe ho mam. Agar ek product ko aap do category mein map karoge mam main main sach batau aapke mein na catalog mein thodi dikkat bhi hai. Isme aapka ek bhi aisa product nahi hai jo ki do category se map ho. Sare ke sare aapke single category mein map hai mam product. Mam isko bhi agar apan theek kare na to usse bhi aapki buyleads aur call good inquiry ka flow aapka badh jayega. Suppose kijiye ke ek product hai na diaper isko aadmi ek hi naam se thodi search karta hai kisi aur naam se bhi matlab uske do teen naam honge kai to kuch aur bulate honge ya kuch aur matlab ho jata hoga. Paper tape hai isko kisi aur naam se bhi maan lo agar search karenge to aisa hota hai agar us naam se bhi agar hum isme mention karte hain category to waha pe mil jayega ye paper tape ki tape ko mam tissue tape aur bolte hain bolte hain na. Hello hai na? Haan sir. Haan isko hum tissue tape ki category mein agar isko hum add kare to aapka jo product aap jo ki iski is category se related aapko leads aayengi wo bhi isme show karengi aapko ab mam air bed hai air bed ko hum aur hum naam se jaye to aero aerobed air mattress aerobed betaster gaddi aerobed ear methisal is ye mam kafi categories hain jinko hum isme add kar sakte hain. To mam yahi hai video meet ka aap mere ko time bata do main aapse jab video meet kar saku.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Kal kitne baje mam?
Customer: 12 baje.
Executive: Kal 12 baje. Theek hai. Haan to mam main keh raha hu abhi ticket ko close kar du ya fir chalne du?
Customer: Kya hua sir?
Executive: Mam jo aapne ticket dali hai usko mam abhi close kar du kya?
Customer: Sir aap kal close kar dijiyega to jyada sahi rahega. Theek hai mam kal kar dunga mam kal kar dunga. Theek hai sir. Koi issue nahi hai main kal kar dunga. Okay. se to fir bataiye sir.
Executive: Nahi mam koi problem nahi hai mam hum to aapki service ke liye baithe hue hain koi issue nahi hai aap kal kar denge. Theek hai. Okay okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants refund of subscription amount.

- No business generated from IndiaMART platform.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the process of cataloging.

- Executive suggested adding product in multiple categories.

- Executive scheduled a Google Meet for tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect on Google Meet tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, catalog, buyleads

seller_categories.mcat_name: Dr Morepen Blood Glucose Test Strips
